abstract: Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev shows emotion for first time as his family members take the stand to plead for his life during sentencing phase of his trial.
lead_paragraph: The young man convicted in the Boston Marathon bombing showed rare emotion during the sentencing phase of his trial.

headline.main: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev Weeps as Relatives Try to Spare Him
headline.print_headline: Tears Dissolve Boston Bomber’s Bored Facade as Relatives Try to Spare Him

snippet: The young man convicted in the Boston Marathon bombing showed rare emotion during the sentencing phase of his trial.
